successes.title: HDMIPi Affordable 9" High-Def screen for the Raspberry Pi
successes.description: Small HDMI screens are  expensive. Native HD ones are astronomical. We want to drive the price down "Raspberry Pi" style.

Pledges.description: Project updates. Stay in touch with how the project is going.
Project updates and a Cyntech Raspberry Pi case.
HDMIPi early bird: 9" HDMIPi 1280x800 LCD, driver board, plastic surround
HDMIPi standard: 9" HDMIPi 1280x800 LCD, driver board, plastic surround

HDMIPi extra: 9" HDMIPi 1280x800 LCD, driver board, plastic surround, power supply, stand, SD card with OpenELEC and Big Buck Bunny pre-installed so you can check out your screen as soon as you get it.

HDMIPi extra2: 9" HDMIPi 1280x800 LCD, driver board, plastic surround, power supply, stand, SD card with OpenELEC and Big Buck Bunny pre-installed so you can check out your screen as soon as you get it.

HDMIPi extra3: 9" HDMIPi 1280x800 LCD, driver board, plastic surround, power supply, stand, SD card with OpenELEC and Big Buck Bunny pre-installed so you can check out your screen as soon as you get it.

HDMIPi deluxe: 9" HDMIPi 1280x800 LCD, driver board, plastic surround, power supply, stand, SD card with OpenELEC and Big Buck Bunny pre-installed so you can check out your screen as soon as you get it.
Cyntech Pi case, PiHub, "Noodle" USB & HDMI leads

HDMIPi deluxe2: 9" HDMIPi 1280x800 LCD, driver board, plastic surround, power supply, stand, SD card with OpenELEC and Big Buck Bunny pre-installed so you can check out your screen as soon as you get it. Cyntech Pi case, PiHub, "Noodle" USB & HDMI leads

HDMIPi deluxe3: 9" HDMIPi 1280x800 LCD, driver board, plastic surround, power supply, stand, SD card with OpenELEC and Big Buck Bunny pre-installed so you can check out your screen as soon as you get it. Cyntech Pi case, PiHub, "Noodle" USB & HDMI leads

HDMIPi Mega: 9" HDMIPi 1280x800 LCD, driver board, plastic surround, power supply, stand, SD card with OpenELEC and Big Buck Bunny pre-installed so you can check out your screen as soon as you get it. Cyntech Pi case, PiHub, "Noodle" USB lead, special flexible short "knuckle" HDMI lead, portable wireless keyboard with touchpad mouse, Edimax wifi dongle.
